text: The Railway Station Bananal building is a historical and tourist city Bananal, São Paulo State, Brazil. Built in 1888, is the only specimen of steel construction the Belgium in the Americas.Notícias Centro Brasileiro de Arqueologia -junho de 2012- E. F. title: Railway Station Bananal
